subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Mike Weir, a left-hander from Canada, birdied his first four holes and pummeled the defenseless T.P.C. Boston course with 10 birdies for a record-tying round of 61.
snippet: Mike Weir, a left-hander from Canada, birdied his first four holes and pummeled the defenseless T.P.C. Boston course with 10 birdies for a record-tying round of 61.
